name: NavMeshPathfinding
previewIconUrl: https://resources.gdevelop-app.com/assets/Icons/Line Hero Pack/Master/SVG/Maps and Navigation/Maps and Navigation_map_find_search.svg
shortDescription: Pathfinding allows to compute an efficient path for objects, avoiding obstacles on the way.
description:
Compare to the built-in pathfinding behavior, this one aims to:
- better respect obstacle shapes
- find pathes faster if obstacles don't move

eventsFunctions.description: Define JavaScript classes.
eventsFunctions.name: DefineJavaScript

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Move the object to a target in straight lines while avoiding all objects that are flagged as obstacles.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: NavMeshPathfindingBehavior

events.comment: Initiate and attach properties as objects variables

eventsFunctions.description: the cell size for obstacle collision mask rasterization. While an object is needed, this will apply to all objects using the behavior.
eventsFunctions.group: Obstacle for pathfinding (navigation mesh, experimental)  configuration
eventsFunctions.name: CellSize

eventsFunctions.description: the area left bound. The left bound of the area where objects can go. While an object is needed, this will apply to all objects using the behavior.
eventsFunctions.group: Obstacle for pathfinding (navigation mesh, experimental) configuration
eventsFunctions.name: AreaLeftBound

eventsFunctions.description: the area top bound. The top bound of the area where objects can go. While an object is needed, this will apply to all objects using the behavior.
eventsFunctions.group: Obstacle for pathfinding (navigation mesh, experimental) configuration
eventsFunctions.name: AreaTopBound

eventsFunctions.description: the area right bound. The right bound of the area where objects can go (default to the game resolution). While an object is needed, this will apply to all objects using the behavior.
eventsFunctions.group: Obstacle for pathfinding (navigation mesh, experimental) configuration
eventsFunctions.name: AreaRightBound

eventsFunctions.description: the area bottom bound. The bottom bound of the area where objects can go (default to the game resolution). While an object is needed, this will apply to all objects using the behavior.
eventsFunctions.group: Obstacle for pathfinding (navigation mesh, experimental) configuration
eventsFunctions.name: AreaBottomBound

eventsFunctions.description: Invalidate navigation mesh.
eventsFunctions.name: InvalidateNavMesh
